interpretation: The "sparkling heart" emoji represents the purity and beauty of love. It conveys the idea of a heart that is filled with joy and happiness. The sparkling effect adds a touch of magic and mystery to this card. This card signifies a deep connection between two individuals that is based on love, trust, and mutual understanding. It represents the beginning of a new relationship or the renewal of an existing one. This card also signifies the importance of self-love and self-care. It reminds us to take care of ourselves and to love ourselves before we can truly love others.
